com.google.devtools.simple.runtime.components.android.util
Class MediaUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.google.devtools.simple.runtime.components.android.util.MediaUtil

public class MediaUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Utilities for loading media.

Method Summary

copyMediaToTempFile

public static java.io.File copyMediaToTempFile(Form form,
                                               java.lang.String mediaPath)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
Copies the media specified by mediaPath to a temp file and returns the File.

getDrawable

public static Drawable getDrawable(Form form,
                                   java.lang.String mediaPath)
                            throws java.io.IOException
Loads the image specified by mediaPath and returns a Drawable.

If mediaPath is null or empty, null is returned.

Parameters:
form - the Form
mediaPath - the path to the media
Returns:
a Drawable or null
Throws:
java.io.IOException

loadSoundPool

public static int loadSoundPool(SoundPool soundPool,
                                Form form,
                                java.lang.String mediaPath)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Loads the audio specified by mediaPath into the given SoundPool and returns the sound id. Note that if the mediaPath is a content URI or an URL, the audio must be copied to a temp file and then loaded from there. This could have performance implications.

Parameters:
soundPool - the SoundPool
form - the Form
mediaPath - the path to the media
Throws:
java.io.IOException

loadMediaPlayer

public static void loadMediaPlayer(MediaPlayer mediaPlayer,
                                   Form form,
                                   java.lang.String mediaPath)
                            throws java.io.IOException
Loads the audio or video specified by mediaPath into the given MediaPlayer. Note that if the mediaPath is an URL, the audio or video must be copied to a temp file and then loaded from there. This could have performance implications.

Parameters:
mediaPlayer - the MediaPlayer
form - the Form
mediaPath - the path to the media
Throws:
java.io.IOException

loadVideoView

public static void loadVideoView(VideoView videoView,
                                 Form form,
                                 java.lang.String mediaPath)
                          throws java.io.IOException
Loads the video specified by mediaPath into the given VideoView. Note that if the mediaPath is an asset or an URL, the video must be copied to a temp file and then loaded from there. This could have performance implications.

Parameters:
videoView - the VideoView
form - the Form
mediaPath - the path to the media
Throws:
java.io.IOException
